title: The confescion of the fayth of the Sweserla[n]des
author: Schweizerischer Evangerlischer Kirchenbund.
notes: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
On a2: "Translated out of laten by George Ussher [i.e. Wishart], a scotchman, who was burned in Scotland, the yeare of oure lorde M.v.C.xl.vi.".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
